EmailTemplate.description: Registration email with link to be sent Jan 2017
EmailTemplate.name: 2017 HOC Invitations GL.2017 HOC Registration
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Information: Honeywell Helicopter Operators Conference - March 6, 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View in browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> HONEYWELL ANNOUNCES HELICOPTER OPERATORS CONFERENCE MARK YOUR CALENDAR FOR MARCH 6, 2017! Honeywell is pleased to announce that the 2017 Honeywell Helicopter Operators Conference (HOC) will be held on Monday, March 6, 2017 in Dallas, TX.
The conference will provide an overview of the Commercial Helicopter business and include technical briefings on Honeywell propulsion engines, avionics and safety equipment.
Representatives from Honeywell's Customer Business Teams, Technical Sales, Marketing & Product Management and Customer & Product Support organizations will be on hand to discuss our latest products and support offerings and share valuable information and experiences through a series of presentations and roundtable discussions. For additional information or questions about the 2016 Honeywell Helicopter Operators Conference, please contact your Customer Support Program Manager or the 2016 HOC coordinator: Deta Adams Deta.Adams@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:deta.adams@honeywell.com]]> 256-508-2708 Office Â© 2016 Honeywell International Inc. <[[ttps://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://twitter.com/honeywell_aero]]> <[[https://m.youtube.com/user/HoneywellDefense]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> Sign up for the Helicopter Newsletter here. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/newsletter]]> This message was sent to {{lead.Email Address:default=edit me}}. If you don't want to recieve these emails from Honeywell in the future you can unsubscribe <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Unsubscribelandingpage.html]]> Terms of Use <[[http://www.honeywell.com/terms-conditions]]> | Privacy Policy <[[http://www.honeywell.com/privacy-statement]]> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us]]>
